text: The 2018 Asian Games, also known as the XVIII Asian Games, was a sports event in Jakarta and Palembang, Indonesia. It occurred from 18 August to 2 September, 2018. There were 465 events from 40 sports and disciplines. ==Notes== ==References== Category:2018 in Indonesia Category:2018 in sports Category:Asian Games by year Category:Sport in Indonesia
title: 2018 Asian Games
